title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list and delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same features as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use Ollama models as LLMs, chat or embeddings inside any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, RAG, multi-user, dark mode).

title: llamafile
summary: Mozilla’s single-file executable LLM runner that can load GGUF models from Ollama library.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by community: OllamaGenerator & OllamaChatGenerator nodes for Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with fuzzy-find model picker, conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain for private docs.

title: ollama-npc
summary: Unity plugin that lets game developers run Ollama models as AI-driven NPCs locally in builds.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK: .NET Standard 2.0 client covering chat, generate, pull and embeddings APIs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC model cache and ingress.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate wrapping Ollama’s REST API with async/await and serde models.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app providing a chat widget, admin interface to manage models and REST endpoints.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app with session memory, model selector and markdown rendering against local Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Lightweight TUI (Rust) for browsing and chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: End-to-end RAG chatbot template using Ollama, FastAPI, React and Qdrant for production deployments.
